general_info.summary: This list provides updates and information related to Covid-19, details about Sharda University's campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, mentions courses on Human Values and Professional Ethics, and includes a reference to the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal and an International Credit Transfer Programme.

career_opportunities.summary: This text outlines potential career paths available after completing a course, specifically mentioning options within colleges and universities, and at Rajiv Gandhi Cancer Hospital. It encourages individuals to pursue a career in the medical field and notes the involvement of recruiters.
